-- | Libary for calculating distances between two coordinates in WSG84
--   
--   Algorithm used embraces the earth as a perfect sphere
@package geocalc
@version 1.0.0

module Numeric.Geocalc

-- | getDistance takes two Coordinates in WSG84 and checks if they are
--   valid. If they are it calculets the distance between them in
--   kilometres
getDistance :: (Double, Double) -> (Double, Double) -> Maybe Double
